reviewsJson.markdown:
Save your money and don’t buy this ingredient. It tastes like dirty black licorice and it smells like a blue pine-sol cleaning product. 
I mixed it at 8% solo with a touch of super sweet, was I very surprised when I first hit it. 
I then mixed a 4% blue razz with 8% raspberry sweet, better, except the delicious raspberry sweet was tainted by that dirty taste.
I’ve heard that some people like it. I respect that, to each their own, although this was a very disappointing flavour for me.
reviewsJson.author: WolfImperator
reviewsJson.title: Blue Raspberry
